# Instructions

## Using the glorious agents framework

- Read, understand, and follow general guidelines in `./AGENTS.md`
- If available, **ALWAYS** use the agentic workflow as described in `./AGENTIC-WORKFLOW.md`.
- NOTE! Special rules apply to code reviews performed by GitHub CoPilot, explained below.

## General coding

- Always follow the guidelines described in `.github/prompts/best-practices.prompt.md`, `.github/prompts/code-analysis.prompt.md`, and `.github/prompts/pythonic-code.prompt.md`.

## GitHub CoPilot Code Reviews

- Follow the general coding guidelines, except when it comes to creating issues in concrete files. 
- Any issue should be reported using GitHubs comment feature, preferrably with a suggested code change the user can choose to apply.
